description:
A blimp flies happily in the skies over Third Street. Tama and the others want to somehow be friends with it so it will take them up into the sky. They jump from the high place behind the shrine to try and catch it, but...
On nights when you can see a halo around the moon, the cats gather. Tama and the others head to the park where they start wondering why tails exist and imagine all kinds of things.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Be Friends / The Dreams of Tails
Tomodachi ni Narouze / Shippo ga Miru Yume
友達になろうぜ / しっぽがみる夢
